snippet: Mike Piazza played five games for the Marlins, in 1998, but his Marlins baseball cards remain objects of desire for a lawyer in California and a student in Miami.
abstract: Baseball memorabilia collectors Jerry Dworkin and Chris Fernandez are from opposite ends of the country, and have never met, but share one peculiar passion: collecting baseball trading cards of then-rookie Mike Piazza in a Florida Marlins uniform.
lead_paragraph: Mike Piazza played five games for the Marlins, in 1998, but his Marlins baseball cards remain objects of desire for a lawyer in California and a student in Miami.

headline.seo: Holding On to Piazza’s Stint With Marlins
headline.main: Piazza, the Marlin, And a Shared Fixation
headline.print_headline:
A Shared Obsession
With Piazza, the Marlin
